entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Ice pellets early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
